resources.string: The password is not strong enough! \nPassword should have 8 characters and include: uppercase and lowercase letters,\nnumbers and a special character (!@#$*)
Username must be at list 8 characters long
Username must be no more than 24 characters long
The two passwords you entered are not equal
This username is already in use\nPlease choose another username
Good luck in your shift! \nPlease logout to keep your data safe
Hope it was a good shift! See you soon\nPlease logout to keep your data safe
